words.definition: A drawing of an area showing roads, cities, etc.
words.arabic_definition: رسم لمنطقة يُظهر الطرق والمدن وما إلى ذلك.

example.en: Look at the map to find the museum.

words.definition: The direction towards the top of a map.

example.en: The library is to the north of the park.
The restaurant is south of the cinema.

words.definition: The direction to the right on most maps.
words.arabic_definition: الاتجاه إلى اليمين في أغلب الخرائط.

example.en: The bank is to the east of the school.
The hospital is west of the bus station.
